# Breaking Point (Play of the Week)

| length         = 95 mins
| guests         =
| prev           =
| next           =
| season_article =
| episode_list   =
}}
"Breaking Point" is a 1965 British television play about men in the Canadian Arctic. It was based on a stage play that debuted in 1962. It was a rare Canadian set story at the time.
During the original transmission of the play, the sound stopped working during the crucial denouement. This meant the play had to be repeated.
Premise
Six men on an expedition in the Canadian Arctic are cut off. One of the men dies and all evidence points to murder.
Cast
* David Bauer as Ray Forbes
* Barrie Ingham as Steve Granger
* Michael Latimer as David Forbes
* Bill Nagy as Mike Sandor
* Morris Perry as Paul Ormiston
* Harvey Spencer as Peter Holt
* Grant Taylor as Danny
